title: Your game keeps crashing
body:
In the middle of a game, crashes
Cant reconnect, no matter how many times i retry
Then i get penalized 
its not my internet. its not my computer. 
the new client is bad.

replies.body:
If your client keeps disconnecting you while you're in-game, there's probably some underlying issue that is keeping your network from having a stable connection to our game servers. Your home internet can be in tip-top shape and you can still have troubles connecting with specific servers. 

Check out the steps in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can try to narrow down what's preventing you from staying in the game. Hit me back up if you're still having problems!

Yes, I am having the same f$$$$$$ problem. It's really badly pissing me off. I can not play one game without restarting my game in the middle. No other game has this issue. It's not my PC its league itself.
